B1 a subject that is discussed, written about, or studied: Our discussion included topics such as acid rain and the melting of polar ice. Your essay can be on any topic you like. on topic
(also on-topic) relating directly to the subject that is being discussed, written about, or studied: She did not find it easy to keep her essays on topic. Try to stay on topic! In your comments please be on-topic and appropriate. Do not disclose personal information. This blog is intended to encourage polite on-topic discussions . off topic
(also off-topic) not relating directly to the subject that is being discussed, written about, or studied: Sorry for going a bit off topic. This may be somewhat off topic but it is worth mentioning. We reserve the right to delete off-topic or inflammatory comments.
